title: WTB: T206 Ames, Hands At Chest, SGC50 or better
author: pgellis

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Ames, Hands At Chest, SGC50 or better
posts.post_content:
I am collecting the T206 set and have 2 large wall display cases that hold 50 graded cards each.  My intention is to display the first 100 T206s (alphabetically) in these cases, so I have been concentrating heavily on the "first 100" cards.

I am now down to just 1 more card for the first display case of 50.  I am sick of taking it down off the wall every time I have added a new card to this case over the past couple of years.

Anyways, all I need to finish the "first 50" now is a Red Ames, Hands At Chest in SGC50 or better (no PSA please).

Anybody have one for sale so I don't have to take this down off my wall ever again?

Thanks for your consideration,
Phil

Would love to see photos!

I don't have an Ames :(
Thanks Chris,  I will get some photos up soon.

3 Week Bump......

Alright, I guess there are no Ames, Hands at Chest in SGC50 (or better) out there for sale, but I am guessing someone might have one in their collection.

So, I have a nice, crisp $100 bill in my pocket that is burning a hole right now.  I will offer $100 for an Ames, Hands at Chest in SGC50 (more money for a SGC60, etc.).

My guess is that if you have one in your collection, you have had it for a while and I will also guess that you probably paid around $50 or so for it, so I will offer you a 100% profit on your card.

Hopefully someone may be willing to part with one so I don't have to ever take this huge display case down off my wall again.

Thanks for your consideration,
Phil
